text: Mbe maaŋ mben muun za mbuim, mba buaadegi gumgi rɨgar bomadagi guma mbe ki. Ana Fherasi guma ma, ana zɨ, Gamarier. Ana Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuin mbe khɨvi guma ma. Ana maaŋ mbuim, mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe za ana zɨ ndim vun kuamkuagi. Ana khavgia thɨgap, kama havharar khaŋ mba gumgi ga nzuai, “Nde mba Zisas farasegi ŋaara gumgi ga sararim, mbe kha buaadegi gumgi kav buni nzuai ŋaneŋ thav kɨrar hegɨp, tuga tɨvaneŋra kegɨp, taagip vhen zirɨrga.” 5.34 Por fhum Zisas zɨn panan ruagi fhuv tugen, Gamarier, ana shure muuŋgi mparmpare kegi. Ndu FG 22.3 ganɨri.
